parse.title: List of country subdivisions by Punjabi speakers

text.*:
This article needs additional citations for verification. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (August 2016) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This is a list of first-level administrative country subdivisions by Punjabi speakers in the world.

Contents

  • 1 First-level list
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes
  • 4 References
  • 5 External links

  2. ^ All people aged 3 and over.
